name: Un"leash"ed
description:
These are not the dogs you need. These are the dogs you deserve *squeezy-toy*

 WASD or arrows to move. 

Can you man-oeuvre through the suburban mayhem and keep yourself safe from the calamity your growing pack of doggos brings upon you?

Tighten that treat-pouch. Limber those limbs. It’s the leash you could do.

Walking your favorite furry friend might seem like a breeze but … add multiple…  

Step up and lead your pack of furry friends to safety. But look out, your floopy avitar hasn’t quite got gravity together…
